question: Vashishtha Narayan Singh, who passed away recently, was the noted personality of which field?
explanation: Renowned mathematician Vashishtha Narayan Singh passed away in Patna  on 14th November 2019. Born in 1942 in Basantpur village of the Bhojpur district in Bihar, Singh became a legend as a student when he was allowed by Patna University to appear in the two-year course of B.Sc (Hons) in Mathematics in its very first year.
